alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:05PM CDT until July 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sparta, or 11 miles southeast of Ozark, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ava, Sparta, Oldfield, Rome, Chadwick, Elkhead, Goodhope, Bruner, Keltner, Dogwood and Garrison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
